mapper.select: select a.* , (select a_name from area_data where a_no = #{a_no}) a_name from (select * from discussion_board where b_checkeddel = 0 and b_addinfo = #{a_no}) a order by b_no
mapper.insert: insert into discussion_agreeinfo (b_no, u_email, agreenum) values (#{b_no},#{u_email},#{agreenum})
mapper.update: update discussion_board set b_agreementcount = (select count(*) from discussion_agreeinfo where agreenum = 1 and b_no = #{b_no}), b_oppositioncount = (select count(*) from discussion_agreeinfo where agreenum = 2 and b_no = #{b_no}) where b_no = #{b_no}
